text:
Don’t know if it’s the latest CLI update but I can’t upload my theme with the --convertFields tag

```ms@MacBook-Pro dev % hs upload --convertFields "my-theme" "my-theme"
(node:40385) [DEP0040] DeprecationWarning: The `punycode` module is deprecated. Please use a userland alternative instead.
(Use `node --trace-deprecation ...` to show where the warning was created)
Uploading files from "my-theme" to "my-theme" in the Design Manager of account XXXXX
[ERROR] escapeRegExp is not a function
hs upload [--src] [--dest]

Upload a folder or file from your computer to the HubSpot CMS.

Positionals:
  src   Path to the local file, relative to your current working directory.
                                                                        [string]
  dest  Path in HubSpot Design Tools, can be a net new path.            [string]

Options:
      --version                Show version number                     [boolean]
  -d, --debug                  Set log level to debug [boolean] [default: false]
      --help                   Show help                               [boolean]
  -c, --config                 Path to a config file                    [string]
  -p, -a, --portal, --account  HubSpot portal id or name from config    [string]
  -m, --mode                   Write to <draft | publish>               [string]
      --use-env                Use environment variable config
                                                      [boolean] [default: false]
      --saveOutput             If true, saves all output from javascript fields
                               files as 'fields.output.json'.
                                                      [boolean] [default: false]
      --convertFields          If true, converts any javascript fields files
                               contained in module folder or project root.
                                                      [boolean] [default: false]
      --clean                  Will cause upload to delete files in your HubSpot
                               account that are not found locally.
                                                      [boolean] [default: false]
      --force                  Skips confirmation prompts when doing a clean
                               upload.                [boolean] [default: false]```
I’ve tried just one module that doesn’t upload either.

I can however convert the fields with the hs cms convert-fields command
This was working the other week

I downgraded node to the 20 LTS version which get’s rid of the Deprecation warning
But the rest still doesn’t work
From the dev account - go to Test accounts on the side. Create a test account then go to Settings and create a private app. That private app will have your access token
